participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and determined, with a strong sense of duty towards helping others.
participant_1.background: I'm a professional wrestler. I volunteer in a homeless shelter. In my spare time I do volunteer work. I like to workout a few times a week. I enjoy being around people.

participant_2.name: Maria
participant_2.personality: Friendly and family-oriented, with a passion for food and community.
participant_2.background: I live in Alabama. I like tacos. I have one brother. I have three sisters.
